entry.title: Hello Blog
entry.content:
Sam’s Blog | Code, lies, and blargles.

Hello, blog.

Over the past year or so, I’ve made copious notes and observations on coding, software delivery, agile practices and other generally programming-related things. Most of these are locked up in private notes, in emails, or just rattling around my brain, and serving no useful purpose to anyone. So, I think it’s about time I do what I’ve been thinking about doing for the last few years, and start adding my own thoughts to the hive mind, lest SkyNet sees me only through my ‘private’ musings.

Now, without any ado, nor adon’t, some wordsâ€¦

Sunday, 8th September, 2013
